oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-06-01 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from June 1, 1957. Featuring possibly Dave Overton (announcer, unconfirmed), Ray Price (host/performer), guest performers Merle Travis and Jimmy Dean, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 921st broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Rod Brasfield; Jimmy Dean; Stringbean; Ray Price
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Ray Price introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Rod Brasfield) -- Prince Albert commercial (Minnie Pearl, Ray Price) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Ray Price introduces Jimmy Dean -- Happy Child (Jimmy Dean) -- Ray Price introduces Stringbean -- Going Down The Road Feeling Bad (Stringbean) -- Ray Price talks -- I've Got A New Heartache (Ray Price) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ray Price) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Station announcements (Dave Overton)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Overton, Dave; Brasfield, Rod; Atkins, Chet; Minnie Pearl; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Jackson, Tommy; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Travis, Merle; Dean, Jimmy
